analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/1/0x2f141ce366a2462f02cea3d12cf93e4dca49e4fd.sol:
	Contract FreeToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/1/0x2f141ce366a2462f02cea3d12cf93e4dca49e4fd.sol#444-448)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/1/0x2f141ce366a2462f02cea3d12cf93e4dca49e4fd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/1/0x2f141ce366a2462f02cea3d12cf93e4dca49e4fd.sol#2-3): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/1/0x2f141ce366a2462f02cea3d12cf93e4dca49e4fd.sol#180) is not in mixedCase
